name: Shape Place (Update 0.01)
description:
Hello

This game was made on scratch and was inspired by this scratch game:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/534191960/

This is a "dodge projectiles" type of game. Kinda obvious.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Z to shoot (Phase 3)

Touch the Yellow Circles (Pellets) to attack the shooter guy (Phase 1)

Restart (Top Right) to Restart

Square (Top Right) to Restart but stop.
